A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie wasn’t bad\, but it was very disappointing. So many of the plot lines established in The Force Awakens were just cast aside. Luke flipping his light saber over his shoulder was so anticlimactic. The whole Finn\, Rose\, Master Hacker angle was completely stupid. Snoke going out like he did was also a huge waste of a character. So many characters and plot lines were just thrown away.
